shout.body: Hi Cher, happy to see you going strong ..This is Western Ranch Music Record Label & Publishing. "Esther 'Kitty' Casteel" Author, Composer and WRM Record Label Owner from the 1940's to the late 80's (pioneer of C&W retro, Blues and Rockabilly songs) has passed away at age 95 in Dec. of 2006, at a Bakersfield, Ca., hospital. You may remember our label from Thornton, Ca. (Pic to the left) WRM wants you to know that we are still alive as a Record Label and Publisher after 56 years! I have songs that I know you will love and hope you will sing for us some day. One is called "Rose of Cherokee" (Need a male singer, to sing it to with/to you). You can hear it, on 'last.fm' under Artist "Virge Brown". Wrtten/Composed by "Esther 'Kitty' Casteel" 1956,84,95; I think you will also like our 'One Little Rose' and 'Forbidden Kisses' from 1967.(In your style of course). For record label history: http://www.myspace.com/westernranchmuisc ; and E-mail at westernranchmusic@gmail.com ; WRM
